Description: Book of the Dead of Pennesuttawy; sheet 19(fragments); Hieratic text in red and black ink.
Curator's comments: Published: Munro, I. 2001. Das Totenbuch des Pa-en-nesti-taui (pLondon BM 10064) aus der Regierungszeit des Amenemope. HAT (Handschriften des Altagyptischen Totenbuches) 7, Wisbaden. Lenzo, G. 2023. The Book of the Dead in the Third Intermediate Period, in: Lucarelli, R. and M.A. Stadler (eds), The Oxford Handbook of the Egyptian Book of the Dead (online edn, Oxford Academic, 20 June 2023), 91.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (205)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134545) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134545)
